title: Blood 2 The Chosen (+expansion) playthrough -- Part 3
description: Finished up Blood 2 and the expansion as well. The game had some moments of ass and some pretty decent moments too. Overall it's not as bad as people say I think, but the fact that it crashes and doesn't run very well really blows. The expansion was actually better than the base game, so that's nice.
